## Source: ossf-package-analysis (7ceabbeb0d20f6267c8883498e7c31aa52148eff458969a12d2397d930978d85)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@aoflmkt/app-call' @ 100.100.106 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
